10.5.22  10:35 pm   I play the bass clarinet, clarinet, Eb clarinet, and bassoon, in about 10 different ensembles. Too much?

10.5.22  4:58 pm   I just overheard a percussionist turn down a gig offered by someone who was some sort of a talent scout for a really prestigious ensemble. The guy said that joining that ensemble was his dream, but that he needed to learn more and improve his skills by continuing to attend music school, and that he planned to join the ensemble eight years from now. Did he make the right decision, or did I just witness someone make the mistake of his life?
